text: "Talk" is the third single off British alternative rock band Coldplay's third studio album X&Y.; The song was released on 19 December 2005. The song is built around a motif by Kraftwerk's "Computer Love". The song and the "Thin White Duke" remix were both nominated for Grammy Awards in 2007. The remix won the Grammy Award for Best Remixed Recording, Non-Classical. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Talk" on YouTube Category:2005 songs Category:Coldplay songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs
title: Talk (Coldplay song)
